commit message:
Fix Ctrl/Alt keys when prediction is active

Need to reset prediction when modified keys are typed, and also for special keys such as shift-Arrow.
Reset the keyboard mode override when changing keyboard modes in preferences.
Try to get rid of the extra 1-pixel top left border around the input view. Not sure where it's from.

More refactoring of popup handling

Replace 'add shifted to popups' preference with more flexible list of options, and activate backwards-compatible mode by default. Fix crashes / empty popups related to confused resources.

Also rearrange some preferences to hopefully be more intuitive.
